/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the scene. The street itself is devoid of any visible traffic, save for a few lampposts standing sentinel along its length. On the right side of the image, a large billboard stands out, although the content of the billboard is not discernible from this vantage point. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban landscape, with the buildings, billboard, and lampposts all neatly aligned along the street.
